titles.title: Expanded Access to Opioid Abuse Treatment Act of 2017
Expanded Access to Opioid Abuse Treatment Act of 2017

To amend section 303(g)(2) of the Controlled Substances Act to allow certain pharmacists to dispense narcotic drugs for maintenance or detoxification treatment pursuant to the same waiver provisions as apply with respect to nurse practitioners and physician assistants.
Expanded Access to Opioid Abuse Treatment Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
